data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 194,600 people living in Mokokchung through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mokokchung, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Mokokchung a passion to plant another simple church.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Mokokchung.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Mokokchung, Nagaland, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Patni (Hindu traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Mokokchung.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Mokokchung to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mokokchung, Nagaland, India has a population of 194,600.

We estimate Mokokchung has 2,141 people who might know Jesus, 2,361 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 190,098 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mokokchung, Nagaland, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
